sentences.sentence: When I used to do that when I was a kid, my mom would spank me.
sentences.translation: 我小时候做那种事时，我妈妈总是打我的屁股。

sentences.sentence: At our center, we see many parents who spank their children to teach them not to hit their siblings.
sentences.translation: 在我们中心，我们见到很多家长通过打屁股的方式，教育他们的孩子不要打他们的兄弟姐妹。

sentences.sentence: The other two are "good fathers" in that they have steady jobs, pay maintenance, make their children laugh and do not spank them.
sentences.translation: 另外两个是“好父亲”，因为他们有稳定的工作，支付维护费用，逗孩子们开心，也不打孩子屁股。
